CustomField.description: NICC-042337 Push/Pull: External system pushes ARI messages and external system pulls reservations; not preferred as the external system polls the CRS at various intervals. Push/Push: Both systems push messages; e.g. External system pushes ARI to CRS and CRS pushes reservations to External System.
